    Method

    void
    connect(VirtualClient client)
     
    void
    processCommand()
    this method creates an infinite loop in which it gets the lock on the server and if the queue is Empty waits for a command to be added once awoken, removes the event from the queue and calls the execution method in the event execute passing the controller
    void
    processCommandThread()
    creates a Thread to process the commands received
    void
    processEvent()
    this method creates an infinite loop that gets the lock on the server and if the queue is Empty waits for an event to be added once awoken, removes the event from the queue, synchronizes on the list of client skeletons and for each client skeleton it calls the method exposed by the client skeleton receiveEvent(), passing the event
    void
    processEventThread()
    creates a Thread to process the events to send
    void
    receiveCommand(Command command)
    this method is called by the client to send a command taken by input it adds the command to a queue in order to return immediately the command will later be processed by another thread
    void
    run()
    starts the server by initializing processing threads for commands and events, establishes a socket connection to accept incoming client connections each incoming connection is handled by creating a new socket client instance and starting it in a separate thread.
    void
    sendEvent(Event event)
    this method is called by the Model to send to the client an event, which is an update on the model it adds the event to a queue in order to return immediately the event will later be processed by another thread

      public void receiveCommand(Command command) throws RemoteException
      this method is called by the client to send a command taken by input it adds the command to a queue in order to return immediately the command will later be processed by another thread

      public void processCommand()
      this method creates an infinite loop in which it gets the lock on the server and if the queue is Empty waits for a command to be added once awoken, removes the event from the queue and calls the execution method in the event execute passing the controller

    • sendEvent

      public void sendEvent(Event event) throws RemoteException
      this method is called by the Model to send to the client an event, which is an update on the model it adds the event to a queue in order to return immediately the event will later be processed by another thread
      Specified by:

    • processEventThread

      public void processEventThread()
      creates a Thread to process the events to send

    • processEvent

      public void processEvent()
      this method creates an infinite loop that gets the lock on the server and if the queue is Empty waits for an event to be added once awoken, removes the event from the queue, synchronizes on the list of client skeletons and for each client skeleton it calls the method exposed by the client skeleton receiveEvent(), passing the event

    • connect

      public void connect(VirtualClient client)
      Specified by:
      connect in interface VirtualServer

    • run

      public void run()
      starts the server by initializing processing threads for commands and events, establishes a socket connection to accept incoming client connections each incoming connection is handled by creating a new socket client instance and starting it in a separate thread. If an IOException occurs while accepting a new connection, the stack trace is printed, and the server continues to run.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
